description.value: Targets of Weapons with the Flame Quality made by Character, suffer -20 to their Agility Test to avoid setting on fire. Additionally, whenever the character inflicts Righteous Fury with a weapon with the Flame Quality, the target is automatically set on fire. (DW) When used Horde enemies, increases number of hits to the Horde by 1d5.
